info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:41AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Vernon Parish, northern Newton and northeastern Jasper Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 441 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jamestown, or near Newton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Newton, Anacoco, Toledo Bend Dam, Burkeville, New Llano, Hornbeck, Browndell, Farrsville, Hutton, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Jamestown, Kurthwood, Harrisburg, Stringtown, Wiergate and Evans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
